name: "Shopping!" LCD-Jam Submission
description:
Description:

Buying groceries boring you?

Play "Shopping!" and shop like a pro!

Features:

- Realistic shopping action

- Increasing difficulty

- Music that matches the intensity of the gameplay

How to Play:

Press the left arrow key if there's a can to your left

Press the right arrow key if there's a can to your right

More specific key functions:

Press F to toggle full screen

Press S to toggle sound

Source code info:

If you are a Game Maker user and you're on windows, open up game maker after you've downloaded the file, select open a file and open the project from the file labeled something along the lines of: I want to look/mod the source code of "Shopping!"

If you do any modding of the game, tweet me @Clark_and_Such to let me see what you've done with it
